Text.Page:
I can't stand the fact that we were defeated. I want to take down Exodor no matter what it costs.

Can you get me more Ruby Durignite? I'll need more to repair the cannon, and improve efficiency for our next attempt.

You couldn't find any?

This is intolerable! Why can't you follow simple... No, I'm sorry. I get too excited sometimes.

Ruby Durignite is very rare, it makes sense that you couldn't find more.

Besides, repairing this failed experiment would make no difference. I need to go back to the drawing board.

I'll get back to you when I have a new design, then we'll take our revenge.
